Package evs.metric.parameters

Parameters of the verification metrics.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MetricParameter An interface for the parameters required by a verification metric.
 

Class Summary
BooleanArrayParameter A metric parameter that comprises an array of boolean values.
BooleanParameter Records a boolean parameter for a verification metric.
BootstrapParameter A store of bootstrap parameters required for assessing the sampling uncertainty of a verification metric via bootstrapping.
BoxPooledLeadPointsParameter Records the number of points in the box plot pooled by lead time.
BoxUnpooledObsPointsParameter Records the number of points in the box plot ordered by size of observation.
BoxUnpooledPointsParameter Records the number of points in the unpooled box plot.
CentralSpreadBiasParameter Indicates whether the spread-bias plot should be computed in bins around a measure of central tendency.
DecomposeParameter Indicates whether a score will be decomposed.
DoubleArrayParameter A metric parameter that comprises a set of double thresholds stored in a double array.
DoubleParameter Records a double parameter for a verification metric.
DoubleProcedureArrayParameter A metric parameter that comprises a set of double procedures of the same type.
DoubleProcedureParameter Records a double procedure for applying a logical condition to a value.
EqualSamplesParameter Indicates whether equal bins (i.e.
FittedAUCParameter Indicates whether to estimate the ROC score or AUC from a smooth bivariate model.
FittedROCParameter Indicates whether to estimate the ROC from a smooth bivariate model.
ForecastTypeParameter Records the types of forecasts to be used in a verification study.
IntegerParameter Records an integer parameter for a verification metric.
MCRPointsParameter Records the number of points in the MCR diagram.
MEPPointsParameter Records the number of points in the mean error of probability diagram.
MinimumSampleSizeParameter Records the minimum sample size with which to compute a metric.
PositiveIntegerParameter Records an integer parameter for a verification metric.
ProbabilityArrayParameter A metric parameter that comprises a set of double probabilities stored in a double array.
ProbabilityIdentifierParameter Indicates whether a double value is a probability or not.
ProbabilityIntervalParameter A probability interval with lower and upper bounds such that upper > lower and both lower and upper fall in [0,1].
ProbabilityParameter Records a probability parameter for a verification metric.
RankHistSampleParameter Indicates whether absolute or relative frequencies should be used when computing the rank histogram.
ReferenceForecastParameter Stores the identifier of a reference forecast used in a skill calculation.
ReliabilityPointsParameter Records the number of points to use in the reliability diagram.
ROCPointsParameter Records the number of points in the ROC diagram.
ROCScoreMethodParameter Records the method used to compute the empirical ROC score.
ROCScorePointsParameter Records the number of points used to compute the ROC score.
SpreadBiasPointsParameter Records the number of points or bins in the spread-bias plot.
StringArrayParameter A metric parameter that comprises a set of string values stored in a string array.
StringParameter Records a string identifier.
UnconditionalParameter Indicates whether unconditional pairs should be used in preference when conditional pairs are available for metric calculation.
VectorFunctionParameter Wrapper for using a vector function as a parameter.
 

Package evs.metric.parameters Description

Parameters of the verification metrics.
